title: Vial of Fire
contents: text | As an action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw the vial up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a creature or object.
text | On a hit, the target takes 1d8 fire damage.

title: Vial of Cold
contents: text | As an action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw the vial up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a creature or object.
text | On a hit, the target takes 1d8 cold damage.

title: Vial of Lightning
contents: text | As an action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw the vial up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a creature or object.
text | On a hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage.

title: Vial of Thunder
contents: text | As an action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw the vial up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a creature or object.
text | On a hit, the target takes 1d8 thunder damage.

title: Vial of Blade Ward
contents: text | When you drink this vial, you gain resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon intil the end of your next turn.

title: Vial of Light
contents: text | As an action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. The object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet for 1 hour.
text | Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light.
text | If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the vial.

title: Vial of Poison Spray
contents: text | As an action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw the vial up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a creature or object.
text | On a hit, a puff of noxious gas released from the vial. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.

title: Vial of Sacred Flame
contents: text | As an action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw the vial up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact.
text | The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage.

title: Vial of Empowered Weapon
contents: text | As an action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a weapon. The weapon's damage die becomes a d8. The weapon also becomes magical.

title: Vial of Spare the Dying
contents: text | As an action, you gave this vial to a living creature that has 0 hit points. The creature becomes stable.
text | This vial has no effect on undead or constructs.

title: Vial of Thorn Whip
contents: text | As an action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw the vial up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a creature or object.
text | On a hit, the target takes 1d6 piercing damage.
text | If the creature is Large or smaller, you can pull/push the cerature 5 feet closer/away from you.

title: Vial of True Strike
contents: text | When you drink this potion, you gain advantage on your first attack roll against one target on your next turn.

title: Vial of Psychic
contents: text | As an action, you can splash the contents of this vial onto a creature within 5 feet of you or throw the vial up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. In either case, make a ranged attack against a creature or object.
text | On a hit, the target takes 1d4 psychic damage, and have disadvantage on the next attach roll it makes before the end of its next turn.
